description: For those of you who love a good vanilla drink, why not shake it up this St. Patrick's Day? Adding&nbsp;coffee and Irish whiskey to your usual vanilla float creates an indulgent treat that is sure to be every smoothie lover's dream.The combination of cold brew coffee, Bailey's Irish Cream, ice cream, and&nbsp;chocolate syrup creates a sweet and&nbsp;creamy concoction that will leave you wanting more—even if it means going back for seconds!
name: Bailey’s Coffee Float
recipeIngredient: 4 scoops Chocolate ice cream or vanilla ice cream

recipeInstructions.name: Measure 3 ounces of Bailey's Irish Cream into each mug.
recipeInstructions.text: Measure 3 ounces of Bailey's Irish Cream into each mug.

recipeInstructions.name: Place 2 scoops of ice cream in each mug.
recipeInstructions.text: Place 2 scoops of ice cream in each mug.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with chocolate syrup and sprinkles if you want.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with chocolate syrup and sprinkles if you want.
